nodes.text: A female ambassador was sent by the Galactic Empire to the homeworld of the Contessa, whose family ruled the planet and turned the ambassador away. They believed nothing further would come from the visit, but within five years, every member of the family bar the Contessa was dead and their homeworld was enslaved.
The ambassador was mentioned in "Rendezvous Point," a short story written by Jason Fry and published in the 2020 anthology book From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
